cards.flavor_text: [i]“Bestow upon me your blessing, o Vaelios. Let us together rebuild a world of order amidst this vile, depraved chaos.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more enchantments, you may exile target enchantment you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

When this creature enters, forebode twice. [i](To forebode, create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Create a 4/4 blue, black, and red Dragon creature token with flying. If you cast this spell from your graveyard, put a decayed counter on that token. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Flashback {U}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Haste, menace
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, it deals 4 damage to target planeswalker that player controls or battle that player protects.

When this creature enters, behold Armageddon. [i](If you don't control a Fated War token, create one defended by an opponent. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)[/i]
Whenever an ability of a battle you control named Fated War triggers, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.

Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls is dealt excess damage, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Whenever this enchantment enters or you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 colorless Knight creature token.
{1}{R}{R}{G}{G}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Effigy {G}{W} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Vigilance
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

When this creature enters, create a 2/2 colorless Knight creature token.
Whenever you attack, create a token that's a copy of target attacking token you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It is Marisyn's charge to maintain planar harmony. Thus, it falls to us to tip the cosmic scales in her favor.”[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]When Daelos fell, his army stood stronger than ever under their new pledge: Dethrone Jorah, and offer him no mercy.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This creature's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.
{1}{B}{G}: Mill two cards. This creature gains trample until end of turn.

When this creature enters, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If its mana value is less than or equal to the number of types among cards in your graveyard, you may return it to the battlefield instead.

Creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater have ward {2}.
When this creature enters, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control as this ability triggers. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Effigy {G}{U} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Each creature you control with toughness greater than its power assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

cards.flavor_text: [i]As Ozhka's legion bore down on Vhalor, Ing'Wei's past and future intertwined. In that moment, she felt confidence, fear, and somehow, peace; all her enemies saw was deep blue.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Jorah sneered. “Ironic, isn't it? A blade forged for a god begets his own demise. I offered you reign eternal, but you were too weak to see it. Perhaps the fires of hell will provide clarity in your anguish.”[/i]
